Class ServerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ServerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Listens for the responses from server. Creates two handlers: InputCommandHandler to handle incoming messages, OutputCommandHandler to handle outgoing messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerListener​(java.net.Socket serverSocket)
      Instantiates a new server listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Sets the output command handler.
